mapper.insert: insert into db_forumanswer (SEQUENCEID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, TOPICID, PICURL, IPADDRESS, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ANSWER) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{topicid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_forumanswer set OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TOPICID = #{topicid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PICURL = #{picurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IPADDRESS = #{ipaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ANSWER = #{answer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, TOPICID, PICURL, IPADDRESS, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ANSWER from db_forumanswer where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, TOPICID, PICURL, IPADDRESS, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ANSWER from db_forumanswer
